synopsis.text:
Imadoki youkai, or modern monsters, lurk in the shadows of a seemingly ordinary Tokyo suburb, where a young girl named Nekota Kaoru resides. Raised in a typical family and on the brink of blossoming into a happy middle-schooler, Kaoru hides an extraordinary secret: she possesses the uncanny ability to see these mischievous creatures.

As these Japanese monsters wreak havoc in the daily lives of unsuspecting humans, Kaoru becomes all too familiar with their antics. From misplacing socks and unbalancing disposable chopsticks to swapping rinse for shampoo, these youkai delight in causing minor inconveniences. Join Kaoru as she navigates the trials and tribulations of middle school while keeping her supernatural secret under wraps in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
